trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection.CollectionChanged> event is raised when you change which items are in a collection, for example, by adding an element to a collection or removing an element from the collection.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection.CollectionChanged>變更哪些項目或並不會在集合中，例如，加入至集合的項目已從集合移除項目時，就會引發事件。</xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when an individual element changes its value.
trans-unit.target: 個別的項目變更其值時，不會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeAction"></xref> values that specifies how the collection changed.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeAction"></xref>指定集合如何變更的值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that specifies the instance of the collection where the change occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，指定發生變更所在的集合執行個體。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets an action that specifies how the collection changed.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定集合如何變更動作。

trans-unit.source: This property can have one of the following values: |Action|Property value| |------------|--------------------| |An element was added to the collection|`CollectionChangeAction.Add`| |An element was removed from the collection|`CollectionChangeAction.Remove`| |The collection was completely changed|`CollectionChangeAction.Refresh`|
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以具有下列值之一: |動作 |屬性值 | |------------|--------------------| |將元素加入至集合 |`CollectionChangeAction.Add`| |已從集合中移除項目 |`CollectionChangeAction.Remove`| |集合已完全變更 |`CollectionChangeAction.Refresh`|

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance of the collection with the change.
trans-unit.target: 取得與變更集合的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the instance of the collection with the change, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if you refresh the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>代表這項變更，將集合的執行個體或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果重新整理的集合。</xref:System.Object>
